ygData.subject: Re: TNT2 cards
ygData.msgSnippet: ... WHERE did you get it?  I ve been searching all over for the Hercules TNT2 Ultra.  All the shops and online stores only seem to have the non-Ultra in. ...
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 4 Aug 1999, Brendan wrote:
>
> I have a hercules dynamite TNT2 ultra, and I'm VERY happy with it. of the

WHERE did you get it? I've been searching all over for the
Hercules TNT2 Ultra. All the shops and online stores only
seem to have the non-Ultra in.

> The only "problem" is the lack of glide support, which isn't really an
> issue with EQ (i tried playing with my voodoo2 in glide, and switched back
> to the tnt2 because i liked it better), although it's preventing me from

Like I said, the Voodoo 3 actually runs faster and with better
picture quality in DirectX mode than in glide mode.

--
John H. Kim
